trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads primitive data types as binary values in a specific encoding.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Fills the internal buffer with the specified number of bytes read from the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached before numBytes could be read.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx $xx$xxxXxxxx$$xx$ xxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Requested numBytes is larger than the internal buffer size.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx $xx$xxxXxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the next available character and does not advance the byte or character position.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The next available character, or -1 if no more characters are available or the stream does not support seeking.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx $0 xx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads characters from the underlying stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the Encoding used and the specific character being read from the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The next character from the input stream, or -1 if no characters are currently available.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx$ xx $0 xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads the specified number of bytes from the stream, starting from a specified point in the byte array.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The starting point in the buffer at which to begin reading into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This might be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not available, or it might be zero if the end of the stream is reached.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer length minus index is less than count.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

-or-

\n

The number of decoded characters to read is greater than count.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
This can happen if a Unicode decoder returns fallback characters or a surrogate pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads the specified number of characters from the stream, starting from a specified point in the character array.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The starting point in the buffer at which to begin reading into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The total number of characters read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This might be less than the number of characters requested if that many characters are not currently available, or it might be zero if the end of the stream is reached.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer length minus index is less than count.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

-or-

\n

The number of decoded characters to read is greater than count.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
This can happen if a Unicode decoder returns fallback characters or a surrogate pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads in a 32-bit integer in compressed format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx x 00$xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a Boolean value from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by one byte.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the byte is nonzero; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads the next byte from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by one byte.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The next byte read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads the specified number of bytes from the current stream into a byte array and advances the current position by that number of bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
This value must be 0 or a non-negative number or an exception will occur.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxx xx 0 xx x xxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A byte array containing data read from the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This might be less than the number of bytes requested if the end of the stream is reached.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of decoded characters to read is greater than count.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
This can happen if a Unicode decoder returns fallback characters or a surrogate pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads the next character from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the Encoding used and the specific character being read from the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A character read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads the specified number of characters from the current stream, returns the data in a character array, and advances the current position in accordance with the Encoding used and the specific character being read from the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A character array containing data read from the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This might be less than the number of characters requested if the end of the stream is reached.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of decoded characters to read is greater than count.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
This can happen if a Unicode decoder returns fallback characters or a surrogate pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a decimal value from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by sixteen bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A decimal value read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads an 8-byte floating point value from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by eight bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An 8-byte floating point value read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a 2-byte signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by two bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x 0$xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 2-byte signed integer read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 0$xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a 4-byte signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by four bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x 0$xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 4-byte signed integer read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 0$xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads an 8-byte signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by eight bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx 0$xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An 8-byte signed integer read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx 0$xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a signed byte from this stream and advances the current position of the stream by one byte.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A signed byte read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a 4-byte floating point value from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by four bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 4-byte floating point value read from the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a string from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The string is prefixed with the length, encoded as an integer seven bits at a time.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a 2-byte unsigned integer from the current stream using little-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by two bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 2-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a 4-byte unsigned integer from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 4-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads an 8-byte unsigned integer from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by eight bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An 8-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx 0$xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.
